Glossary: at-voc:accessibility Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Accessibility" (https://op.europa.eu/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/accessibility). included Accessibility criteria for persons with disabilities are included. not-inc-proc Accessibility criteria for persons with disabilities are not included because the procurement is not intended for use by natural persons. not-inc-just Accessibility criteria for persons with disabilities are not included with the following justification. at-voc:applicability Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Applicability" (https://op.europa.eu/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/applicability). yes no not-known at-voc:award-criterion-type Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Award criterion type" (https://op.europa.eu/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/award-criterion-type). quality Quality cost Cost price Price at-voc:buyer-legal-type Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Buyer legal type" (https://op.europa.eu/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/buyer-legal-type). cga Central government authority ra Regional authority la Local authority body-pl Body governed by public law body-pl-cga Body governed by public law, controlled by a central government authority body-pl-ra Body governed by public law, controlled by a regional authority body-pl-la Body governed by public law, controlled by a local authority pub-undert Public undertaking pub-undert-ra Public undertaking, controlled by a regional authority pub-undert-la Public undertaking, controlled by a local authority spec-rights-entity Entity with special or exclusive rights org-sub Organisation awarding a contract subsidised by a contracting authority org-sub-cga Organisation awarding a contract subsidised by a central government authority org-sub-ra Organisation awarding a contract subsidised by a regional authority org-sub-la Organisation awarding a contract subsidised by a local authority def-cont Defence contractor int-org International organisation eu-ins-bod-ag EU institution, body or agency pub-undert-cga Public undertaking, controlled by a central government authority at-voc:communication-justification Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Communication justification" (https://op.europa.eu/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/communication-justification). tdf-non-av Tools, devices, or file formats not generally available ipr-iss Intellectual property right issues sp-of-eq Buyer would need specialised office equipment phy-mod Inclusion of a physical model sen-info Protection of particularly sensitive information at-voc:contract-nature Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Contract nature" (https://op.europa.eu/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/contract-nature). works Works supplies Supplies services Services at-voc:country A country is one of the political units which the world is divided into, covering a particular area of land. Compulsory use of the code list from the ISO 3166-1 alpha-3. Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Country" (https://op.europa.eu/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/country). AFG Afghanistan ALA Aland Islands ALB Albania DZA Algeria ASM American Samoa AND Andorra AGO Angola AIA Anguilla ATA Antartica ATG Antigua and Barbuda ARG Argentina ARM Armenia ABW Aruba AUS Australia AUT Austria AZE Azerbaijan BHS Bahamas BHR Bahrain BGD Bangladesh BRB Barbados BLR Belarus BEL Belgium BLZ Belize BEN Benin BMU Bermuda BTN Bhutan BOL Bolivia BIH Bosnia and Herzegovina BWA Botswana BVT Bouvet Island BRA Brazil VGB British Virgin Islands IOT British Indian Ocean Territory BRN Brunei Darussalam BGR Bulgaria BFA Burkina Faso BDI Burundi KHM Cambodia CMR Cameroon CAN Canada CPV Cape Verde CYM Cayman Islands CAF Central African Republic TCD Chad CHL Chile CHN China HKG Hong Kong MAC Macao, SAR China CXR Christmas Island CCK Cocos (Keeling Islands) COL Colombia COM Comoros COG Congo (Brazzaville) COD Congo (Kinshasa) COK Cook Islands at-voc:currency The Currencies Named Authority List (NAL) or Common Authority Table (CAT) is a controlled vocabulary listing currencies with their authority code and labels in the 24 official languages of the EU (when available). The list is based on the ISO standard ISO 4217. This NAL is maintained by the Publications Office of the EU in its Metadata Registry (MDR). Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Currency" (https://op.europa.eu/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/currency). at-voc:direct-award-justification Justifications for the choice of the negotiated procedure without prior publication of a call for competition or concession. Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Direct Award Justification" (https://op.europa.eu/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/direct-award-justification). c-dir2009/81/EC The contract falls within the services listed in Annex II of the Directive 2009/81/EC no-suit-resp No suitable tenders, requests to participate, or applications were received in response to a previous notice. no-reg-resp No regular tenders, requests to participate, or applications acceptable under national provisions were received in response to a previous notice. Only those tenderers were included in the negotiations which have satisfied the selection criteria in the previous procedure. res-exp-stu-dev Purpose of the contract is purely research, experiment, study or development under the conditions stated in the Directive other-serv-dir2009/81/EC The contract concerns research and development services other than those referred to in Directive 2009/81/EC Art. 13 abs-comp The contract can be provided only by a particular economic operator because of an absence of competition for technical reasons uniq-art-work The contract can be provided only by a particular economic operator because of creation or acquisition of a unique work of art or artistic performance exc-rights The contract can be provided only by a particular economic operator because of exclusive rights, including intellectual property rights other-righ-dir2014/23/EU The contract can be provided only by a particular economic operator because of protection of other exclusive rights, including intellectual property rights, other than those defined in Directive 2014/23/EU Art. 5(10) inc-urg-res The periods for the restricted procedure and the negotiated procedure with prior publication of a contract notice are incompatible with the urgency resulting from a crisis ext-urg Extreme urgency brought about by events unforeseeable for the buyer rep-ext-dir Partial replacement or extension of existing supplies or installations by the original supplier ordered under the strict conditions stated in the Directive rep-work-dir New works or services, constituting a repetition of existing works or services and ordered in accordance with the strict conditions stated in the Directive des-con-awa Service contract to be awarded to the winner or one of winners under the rules of a design contest supp-comm-mark Procurement of supplies quoted and purchased on a commodity market pur-ope-wind Purchase on particularly advantageous terms from an economic operator which is definitely winding up its business activities pur-liq-insol Purchase on particularly advantageous terms from the liquidator in an insolvency procedure, an arrangement with creditors or a similar procedure under national laws and regulations temp-adv Bargain purchase taking advantage of a particularly advantageous opportunity available for a very short time at a price considerably lower than market prices cont-arm-dir Contract related to the provision of air and maritime transport services for the armed forces of a Member State deployed or to be deployed abroad, under the strict conditions stated in the Directive out-dir The procurement falls outside the scope of application of the directive at-voc:dps-usage Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "DPS Usage" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/dps-usage). dps-list Dynamic purchasing system, only usable by buyers listed in this notice dps-nlist Dynamic purchasing system, also usable by buyers not listed in this notice none None at-voc:economic-operator-size Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Economic Operator Size" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/economic-operator-size). micro Microenterprise small Small enterprise medium Medium-sized-enterprise large Large enterprise sme Micro, small, or medium at-voc:environmental-impact Requesting compliance with an ISO 14024 Type I environmental label Requesting compliance with the eco-management and audit scheme (EMAS), established by Regulation (EC) No 1221/2009 Requesting compliance with an ISO 14001 environmental management system, other than the eco-management and audit scheme (EMAS) established by Regulation (EC) No 1221/2009 Requesting compliance with the highest energy efficiency class (as defined by various legislation such as, for example, Regulation (EU) 626/2011 on air conditioners) Requesting, for the majority of the relevant purchase, the compliance with Regulation (EC) 834/2007 on organic production and labelling of organic products Other Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Environmental Impact" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/environmental-impact). at-voc:innovative-acquisition at-voc:language Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Language" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/language). at-voc:legal-basis Based on Legal Basis list defined by MDR. (EC) No 1370/2007} 32014L0023 Directive 2014/23/EU 32014L0024 Directive 2014/24/EU 32014L0025 Directive 2014/25/EU 31992L0013 Directive 92/13/EEC 31994D0001 Decision 94/1/EC, ECSC 31994D0800 Decision 94/800/EC 32002D0309 Decision 2002/309/EC, Euratom 32005D0015 Decision 2005/15/EC 32007L0066 Directive 2007/66/EC 32007R0718 {Regulation (EC) No 718/2007} 32008R1008 {Regulation (EC) No 1008/2008} 32013L0016 Directive 2013/16/EU 32014D0115 Decision 2014/115/EU 32014D0691 Decision 2014/691/EU 32015R0323 {Regulation (EU) 2015/323} 31985R2137 {Regulation (EEC) No 2137/85} 32001R2157 {Regulation (EC) No 2157/2001} 32003R1435 {Regulation (EC) No 1435/2003} 32016D0002 {Decision (EU) 2016/245 (ECB/2016/2)} 32018R1046 {Regulation (EU, Euratom) 2018/1046} other Other at-voc:main-activity Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Main Activity" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/main-activity). edu Education elec Electricity-related activities gen-pub General public services gh-pro-tran-dis Production, transport or distribution of gas or heat air Airport-related activities pub-os Public order and safety at-voc:measurement-unit Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Measurement Unit" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/measurement-unit). at-voc:missing-info-submission Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Missing Information Submission" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/missing-info-submission). late-all All missing tenderer-related documents can be submitted later late-some Some missing tenderer-related documents can be submitted later late-none No documents can be submitted later at-voc:modification-justification Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Modification Justification" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/modification-justification) add-work-serv-supp Need for additional works, services or supplies by the original contractor. mod-cir Need for modifications because of circumstances which a diligent buyer could not predict. other Other at-voc:non-award-justification Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Non Award Justification" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/non-award-justification) no-rece No tenders, requests to participate or projects were received all-rej All tenders, requests to participate or porjects were rejected no-signed The highest ranked tenderer(s) refused to sign the contract ins-fund Decision of the buyer, because of insufficient funds chan-need Decision of the buyer, because of a change in needs tch-per-error Decision of the buyer, not following a tenderer's request to review the award, because of technical or procedural errors rev-buyer Decision of the buyer following a tenderer's request to review the award rev-body Decision of a review body or another judicial body one-admis Only one admissible tender, request to participate or project was received other Other at-voc:non-publication-justification Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Non Publication Justification" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/non-publication-justification) law-enf Law enforcement oth-pub-int Other public interest com-eco-ope Commercial interests of an economic operator fair-comp Fair competition at-voc:number-fixed Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Number fixed" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/number-fixed) fix-tot Fixed (total) fix-unit Fixed (per unit) at-voc:number-threshold Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Number threshold" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/number-threshold) min-sco Minimum score max-ten-pass Maximum number of tenders passing at-voc:number-weight Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Number weight" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/number-weight) wei-per-exa Weight (percentage, exact) wei-per-mid Weight (percentage, middle of a range) wei-dec-exa Weight (decimal, exact) wei-dec-mid Weight (decimal, middle of a range) wei-poi-exa Weight (points, exact) wei-poi-mid Weight (points, middle of a range) ord-imp Order of importance at-voc:other-place-service Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Other Place Service" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/other-place-service) anyw-cou Anywhere in the given country anyw-eea Anywhere in the European Economic Area anyw Anywhere at-voc:permission Statement by the Procuring Entity about whether it may apply modifications to the procurement procedure that would alter the overall nature of the contract or the framework agreement. (Pending to review by the WG) Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Permission" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/permission) not-allowed Not allowed allowed Allowed required Required at-voc:procurement-procedure-type It specifies the sort of procurement procedure, which will regulate the conditions and deadlines that apply to the process. Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Procurement Procedure Type" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/procurement-procedure-type) open Open restricted Restricted neg-w-call Negotiated with prior publication of a call for comeptition / competitive with negotiation neg-wo-call Negotiated without prior call for competition comp-dial Competitive dialogue innovation Innovation partnership oth-single Other single stage procedure oth-mult Other multiple stage procedure at-voc:requirement-stage at-voc:reserved-procurement Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Reserved Procurement" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/reserved-procurement) res-pub-ser-rel Participation is reserved to organisations pursuing a public service mission and fulfilling other relevant conditions in the legislation. res-she-ws Participation is reserved to sheltered workshops and economic operators aiming at the social and professional integration of disabled or disadvantaged persons. at-voc:selection-criterion Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Selection Criterion" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/selection-criterion) sui-act Suitability to pursue the professional activity ef-stand Economic and financial standing tp-abil Technical and professional ability other Other at-voc:social-objective Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Social Objective" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/social-objective) at-voc:strategic-procurement Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Strategic Procurement" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/strategic-procurement) red-env-imp Reduction of environmental impacts inn-pur Innovative purchase ful-soc-obj Fulfillment of social objectives none None at-voc:subcontracting-indication Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Subcontracting indication" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/subcontracting-indication) share-subc The share of the contract that the tenderer intends to subcontract prop-subc-oblig The proposed subcontractor(s) necessary to fulfill the obligation to subcontract a minimum percentage of the contract prop-subc-noblig The proposed subcontractor(s) above any obligation to subcontract a minimum percentage of the contract subj-subc-oblig The subject-matter of the subcontract(s) necessary to fulfill the obligation to subcontract a minimum percentage of the contract subj-subc-noblig The subject-matter of the subcontract(s) above any obligation to subcontract a minimum percentage of the contract none None at-voc:subcontracting-obligation Codes and values used to show the obligation of the economic operator to subcontract parts of the original contract to third parties. WG Approval 17/09/2019 Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Subcontracting obligation" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/subcontracting-obligation) Title III of Directive 2009/81/EC at-voc:timeperiods This code list is used by the Duration Measure attribute 'unitCode'. Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Timeperiods" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/timeperiods) YEAR (_S|Year)(_P|Years) YEAR_HALF Half year QUARTER Quarter SPRING Spring SUMMER Summer AUTUMN Autumn WINTER Winter MONTH (_S|Month)(_P|Months) JAN January FEB February MAR March APR April MAY May JUN June JUL July AUG August SEP September OCT October NOV November DEC December WEEK Week MON Monday TUE Tuesday WED Wednesday THU Thursday FRI Friday SAT Saturday SUN Sunday DAY (_S|Day)(_P|Days) HOUR (_S|Hour)(_P|Hours) MIN (_S|Minute)(_P|Minutes) SEC (_S|Second)(_P|Seconds) UNLIMITED Unlimited UNKNOWN Unknown CALENDAR_DAY Calendar Day WORKING_DAY Working Day at-voc:usage Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Usage" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/usage) used Used n-used Not Used nyk Not yet known at-voc:winner-selection-status Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Winner Selection Status" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/winner-selection-status) selec-w The winner was chosen open-nw The winner was not yet chosen, but the competition is still ongoing clos-nw No winner was chosen and the competition is closed cccev:criterion-group-property-type A code categorising the data structure category, how to use or process it, etc. ON* Process the group always ONTRUE Process the group if the previous question was and INDICATOR answered with the value 'true' ONFALSE Process the group if the previous question was and INDICATOR answered with the value 'false' ec:cpv The CPV establishes a single classification system for public procurement aimed at standardising the references used by procuring entities to describe the purpose of procurement contracts and procurement projects. Compulsory use of Common Procurement Vocabulary (CPV) codes (Regulation (EC) No 213/2008) Source: Commision Regulation (EC) No 213/2008 (https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX:32008R0213) 03000000-1 Agricultural, farming, fishing, forestry and related products 03100000-2 Agricultural and horticultural products 03110000-5 Crops, products of market gardening and horticulture 03111000-2 Seeds 03111100-3 Soya beans ... epo:accelerated-procedure-justification-type A procurement procedure where the time limit for receipt of tenders can be reduced due to a state of urgency. PIN_REDUCE_TIME_LIMIT Prior Information Notice to reduce time limits STATE_OF_URGENCY State of Urgency epo:authority-type Aternative name to this code list: - Authority Competency Level Type CGA Central Government Authority SCA Subcentral Government Authority RA Regional Authority LA Local Authority BGPL Body Governed by Public Law epo:award-dimension-parent-criterion-relation PRICE COST QUALITY epo:award-evaluation-method-type A code signifying the type of criterion. CRITERION.EXCLUSION.MISCONDUCT.MC_PROFESSIONAL CRITERION.SELECTION.ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_STANDING.TURNOVER.GENERAL_YEARLY CRITERION.AWARD.LOWEST CRITERION.AWARD.MOST_ECONOMIC_TENDER CRITERION.AWARD.OTHER CRITERION.AWARD.MIXED epo:award-type epo:communication-type Indirect Direct epo:cpb-type cpb-acq Central purchasing body acquiring supplies and/or services intended for other buyers. cpb-awa Central purchasing body awarding public contracts or concluding framework agreements for works, supplies or services intended for other buyers. epo:design-contest-type OPEN RESTRICTED epo:dps-scope Buyers only listed in this notice Buyers listed and not listed in this notice epo:e-evaluation-criterion-type Admistrative Criterion Exclusion Ground Selection Criterion Award Criterion Participation Criterion epo:eo-group-type CONSORTIUM Consortium JOINT_VENTURE Joint Venture UNDERTAKING Undertaking epo:evaluation-group-type REGULAR_BOARD JURY epo:exclusion-criterion epo:form-type plan Planning comp Competition dir-awa-pre Direct award preannouncement result Result cont-modif Contract modification change Change epo:framework-agreement fa-wo-rc Framework agreement, without reopening of competition fa-w-rc Framework agreement, with reopening of competition fa-mix Framework agreement, partly without reopening and partly with reopening of competition none None epo:legal-form-type epo:nace Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Main Activity" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/main-activity). epo:notice-corrigendum-justification cor-one-more Correction of one or more mistakes up-add-info Updated or additional information cor-pub-err Correction of a publication error ori-not-canc The original notice is cancelled buy-int-canc The buyer intends to cancel the original notice pub-info-post Publication of information which was originally postponed for reasons of law enforcement, commercial interests of an economic operator, fair competition or other public interest epo:notification-content-types PLANNING.PIN COMPETITION.PIN COMPETITION.CN COMPETITION.QS DAP.VEAT RESULT.CAN CONTRACT.CM epo:organisation-subrole group-lead Group leader info-prov Organisation providing additional information about the procurement procedure offl-acc Organisation providing offline access to the procurement documents lim-prov Organisation providing more information on the time limits for review procedures req-recep Organisation receiving requests to participate req-proc Organisation processing requests to participate recipient Organisation receiving tenders processor Organisation processing tenders signatory Organisation signing the contract bud-pay Organisation whose budget is used to pay for the contract exec-pay Organisation executing the payment group-member Organisation that is member of a group epo:procurement-regime-type light-regime Set of principles and rules for social and specific services design-contest Set of principles and rules specific of design-contests standard Set of principles and rules for procedures in general epo:regulatory-framewrok-provider info-envir Organisation providing information concerning the general regulatory framework for environmental protection applicable in the place where the contract is to be performed. info-emp Organisation providing information concerning the general regulatory framework for employment protection and working conditions applicable in the place where the contract is to be performed. info-tax Organisation providing information concerning the general regulatory framework for taxes applicable in the place where the contract is to be performed. epo:security-clearance-address We cannot have direct properties pointing at descendant roles of the class Agent, because at the notification time many of them do not exist yet. ECONOMIC_OPERATOR CONTRACTOR TENDERER WINNER SUBCONTRACTOR epo:submission-document-type The period during which tenders submitted for this procurement procedure must remain valid. (Pending to review by the WG) TENDER Tender EOI Expression of interest RFP Request for participation RFC Request for clarification espd:confidentiality-level PUBLIC Information that can be disclose without any particular restriction. TOP_SECRET Information and material the unauthorised disclosure of which could cause exceptionally grave prejudice to the essential interests of the European Union, of one or more of the Member States or of one or more parties participating in a Procedure. SECRET Information and material the unauthorised disclosure of which could seriously harm the essential interests of the European Union, of one or more of the Member States or of one or more parties participating in a Procedure. CONFIDENTIAL Information and material the unauthorised disclosure of which could harm the essential interests of the European Union, of one or more of the Member States or of one or more parties participating in a Procedure. RESTRICTED Information and material the unauthorised disclosure of which could be disadvantageous to the interests of the European Union, of one or more of the Member States or of one or more parties participating in a Procedure. espd:eo-role-type SCLE Sole Contractor/Lead entity LE Lead Entity OERON Other Entity (relied upon) GM Group Member SC Sole Contractor eurostat:nuts e.g. NUTS 2016 size unit-code Version:1.0
